source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_00<tab>Momodi of the Quicksand has word of work for a willing adventurer.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_00<tab>クイックサンドのモモディは、冒険者に新たな冒険の依頼をしたいようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_01<tab>Momodi informs you that Dadanen, a merchant who deals in precious stones, is seeking the aid of an able adventurer. Travel to the settlement of Horizon in western Thanalan and see what work he offers.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_01<tab>モモディ曰く、宝石商「ダダネン」が冒険者を探しているらしい。西ザナラーンの集落「ホライズン」に向かい「ダダネン」から仕事をもらおう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_02<tab>Dadanen tells you that Horizon's role as a center for trade means there is always work to be found. Look around the settlement and see what it has to offer.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_SEQ_02<tab>ダダネンによれば「ホライズン」は交易の要所であるため、冒険者向きの仕事が沢山あるのだという。ホライズンを見てまわり、仕事を探してみよう。
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_TODO_00<tab>ホライズンのダダネンと話す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_1<tab>Look what the coeurl dragged in. Good to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'd ask what brings you, but I reckon we both know the answer to that already.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_1)) (( )) 03 /var>さん、元気かしら？
わたしに話しかけたってことは、
きっと新たな冒険を求めているってことよね？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_2<tab>Well, have I ever let you down before? Wait, don't answer that...
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_2ふふふ、そうこなくっちゃ。
ちょうどあなたにピッタリな仕事があるの。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_3<tab>So happens I know a fella by the name of Dadanen who needs a hand. He's a merchant by trade, sellin' precious stones to those in Ul'dah with the means to buy them.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_3依頼人は、ダダネンさんっていう方よ。
主にウルダハの貴族や富豪たちに、
高価な装飾品を卸している宝石商なの。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_4<tab>He's asked that I send any lookin' for work his way. You can find him over in Horizon, if you fancy.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_4彼は今「ホライズン」という集落にいて、
どうやら冒険者を探しているらしいの。
行って、彼の力になってあげて。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_5<tab>That's in western Thanalan, mind you. Just cross the bridge north of Scorpion Crossing and the road will take you there.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_5ホライズンは、西ザナラーンにあるわ。
「スコーピオン交易所」の北、橋を渡った街道の先よ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_100_5<tab>Knowin' the circles he deals in, might be he'll have some talk of the royal family that'll interest you, as well.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_100_5……もしかして、ダダネンさんなら、
王家の王冠の話も知っているかしら……。
……あら、なんでもないわ、こっちの話よ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_6<tab>And why not make use of a chocobo porter for the journey to Horizon? If you've the gil for it, that is.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_6あ、そうそう、もし財布に余裕があるなら、
ホライズンまでの旅に「チョコボポーター」を
利用してみるっていうのはどう？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_7<tab>You'll find the chocobo stables just across the way from my Quicksand. Find Mimigun─he'll set you straight.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_7クイックサンドのすぐ前にチョコボ留があるから、
そこにいるチョコボ屋「ミミグン」さんに話を聞いてみて。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_8<tab>Well, off you go, then. I haven't got all day to be holdin' your bloody hand!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_MOMODI_000_8じゃあ、新たな冒険の旅に、
いってらっしゃい！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_10<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I presume? Aye, Momodi said to expect you, and so I have.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_10お前が冒険者の)) (( )) 03 /var>だな。
モモディから話は聞いてるぜ。
よく来てくれたな、待ってたぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_11<tab>Welcome to Horizon. Ours is a trading settlement that sees goods in from the port of Vesper Bay to the west─and trade we do. Nary a day goes by that Horizon isn't bustling with some manner of merchants and officials.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_11この「ホライズン」は、
西の港町ベスパーベイから物資が集まる交易の要所。
商人や役人たちで、いつも大賑わいさ！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_12<tab>They keep us running about busy, they do. Enough so that I wish I had chocobo legs in place of my own. And that's why I've asked Momodi to send me any souls looking for work.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_12お陰でいつも忙しくてな。
チョコボの脚だって借りたいくらいだ。
さっそく手伝ってもらおうか！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_13<tab>Twelve know there is plenty of it to be done around here. Speak to me again when you are ready to make yourself of some use.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL026_00623_DADANEN_000_13冒険者の仕事もわんさかあるぜ。
お前も上手くやってガッポリ稼ぎな！
準備ができたら声をかけてくれ。
